title: TRIGGER_IS_CHANGED_TO
description: Returns TRUE if the specified field's value has changed to any of the provided new values in the current trigger context; otherwise, returns FALSE.

parameters.name: field_name
parameters.description: The API name of the field to evaluate.

parameters.name: … new_values
parameters.description: One or more values to compare against the field’s new value. If the field was previously different and now equals one of the specified values, the function returns TRUE.

examples:
TRIGGER_IS_CHANGED_TO("Type", "Vendor", "Partner")
-- Returns TRUE if Type is changed to "Vendor" or "Partner"; otherwise, FALSE.
